thread.title: Three Fireworks Displays on 19 SeptemberTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Three Fireworks Displays on 19 SeptemberTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Three Fireworks Displays on 19 September Published on : Friday, September 11, 2015
The Portuguese fireworks team which could not perform on 5 September due to technical reason is now scheduled to present fireworks display on 19 September (Saturday). With the fireworks teams from Korea and Italy scheduled for performance as well, there will be three fireworks displays on the same night. Citizens and visitors can refer to the latest schedule as follow:
21:00 – Korea – Daehan Fireworks Co 21:30 – Italy – Parente Fireworks Group S.R.L 22:00 – Portugal – Luso Pirotecnia Group The 27th Macau International Fireworks Display Contest is held above the sea in front of Macau Tower on 5, 12, 19, 27 September and 1 October.
Source:- MGTO
